attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why are we in the Eu. We fallow all the rules from health and safty which most of europe ignore. Then we let in half of europe in to the country and pay for them to have cable t.v. There are many many other reasons. But i think the best one i read in the paper the other day was should fire man be allowed to use ladders!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
